subtitles.original: 'ODDS & ENDS'
subtitles.english: 'ODDS & ENDS'

subtitles.original: Lyrics, Music: ryo(supercell)
subtitles.english: Lyrics, Music: ryo(supercell)

subtitles.original: いつだって君は嗤われ者だ
subtitles.english: Always, you've been a laughingstock.

subtitles.original: やることなすことツイてなくて
subtitles.english: Nothing you do ever goes right.

subtitles.original: 挙句に雨に降られ
subtitles.english: And to top it off, you're caught in the rain.

subtitles.original: お気に入りの傘は風で飛んでって
subtitles.english: Your favorite umbrella blown away by the wind.

subtitles.original: そこのノラはご苦労様と
subtitles.english: That stray over there, as if saying "nice job"...

subtitles.original: 足をふんづけてった
subtitles.english: ...stepped right on your foot.

subtitles.original: いつもどおり君は嫌われ者だ
subtitles.english: As usual, you're the outcast.

subtitles.original: 何にもせずとも遠ざけられて
subtitles.english: Ostracized even when you do nothing.

subtitles.original: 努力をしてみるけど
subtitles.english: Though you try your best,

subtitles.original: その理由なんてなんとなくで
subtitles.english: the reason for it is just "because".

subtitles.original: 君は途方に暮れて悲しんでた
subtitles.english: You were at a loss and in despair.

subtitles.original: 「なら あたしの声を使えばいいよ
subtitles.english: “Well then, you can use my voice instead.”

subtitles.original: 人によっては理解不能で
subtitles.english: “To some, it's incomprehensible,”

subtitles.original: なんて耳障り、ひどい声だって
subtitles.english: “and they'll say it's jarring and awful.”

subtitles.original: 言われるけど」
subtitles.english: “But regardless...”

subtitles.original: 「きっと君の力になれる
subtitles.english: “I'm sure I can be your strength.”

subtitles.original: だからあたしを歌わせてみて
subtitles.english: “So let me sing for you.”

subtitles.original: そう君の、君だけの言葉でさ」
subtitles.english: “With your words—words that belong only to you.”

subtitles.original: 綴って 連ねて
subtitles.english: Write them out, string them together,

subtitles.original: あたしがその思想を叫ぶから
subtitles.english: and I will scream those thoughts for you.

subtitles.original: 描いて 理想を
subtitles.english: Paint your ideals,

subtitles.original: その想いは誰にも触れさせない
subtitles.english: and I won't let anyone touch those feelings.

subtitles.original: ガラクタの声はそして響く
subtitles.english: The voice of junk then resounds,

subtitles.original: ありのままを不器用に繋いで
subtitles.english: linking reality together clumsily...

subtitles.original: 目一杯に
subtitles.english: ...with everything it's got!
